com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.bitmap_recycle

Class LruByteArrayPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.bitmap_recycle.LruByteArrayPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteArrayPool

    public final class LruByteArrayPool
extends Object
implements ByteArrayPool
    A fixed size LruByteArrayPool that evicts arrays using an LRU strategy to keep the pool under the maximum byte size.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.bitmap_recycle.ByteArrayPool

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(byte[] bytes)
        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayPool
        Optionally adds the given byte array to the pool.

        Arrays may be ignored, for example if the array is larger than the maximum size of the pool.

        Specified by:
        put in interface ByteArrayPool

      • get

        public byte[] get(int size)
        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayPool
        Returns a non-null byte array with a length >= to the given size.

        If an array of the given size isn't in the pool, a new one will be allocated.

        Specified by:
        get in interface ByteArrayPool

      • clearMemory

        public void clearMemory()
        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayPool
        Clears all byte arrays from the pool.
        Specified by:

        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayPool
        Trims the size to the appropriate level.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
